This section contains API documentation generated from docstrings. 

## Available Functions

- `array_validation` — validate a single 1D unit (row, column, or 3×3 square)
- `row_validation` — validate all rows of a board
- `column_validation` — validate all columns of a board
- `square_validation` — validate all 3×3 squares of a board
- `combined_validation` — validate a whole 9×9 board
